name: Wanna Party！
description:
P1     WASD移动，左shift加速，F呼叫(给出定位) 吼叫（双方同时使用连成攻击性红线，消耗能量）以及站立收集能量

P2     ↑↓←→移动，右shift加速，/呼叫(给出定位) 吼叫（双方同时使用连成攻击性红线，消耗能量）以及站立收集能量

第一阶段触碰大妈会被随机传送。

双方相遇进入第二阶段，紫色跟班可避免一次伤害，其中一人生命耗尽结束游戏。最终需要用红线消灭所有大妈并到达派对地点。

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

P1 WASD movement, left shift acceleration, F call (gives positioning) howl (both use at the same time in an aggressive red line, consumes energy) and stand to collect energy

P2 ↑↓←→ Move, right shift acceleration, / call (to give positioning) roar (both sides use an aggressive red line at the same time to consume energy) and stand to collect energy

Stage 1 Touching granny will be teleported randomly.

The two sides meet in the second stage, the purple sidekick can avoid a damage, one of them runs out of life to end the game. Eventually you have to destroy all the aunties and get to the party.
